import React from 'react'; const Skills = () => { const skillCategories = [ { category: "Frontend Development", skills: [ { name: "HTML", level: 70 }, { name: "CSS", level: 70 }, { name: "JavaScript", level: 65 }, { name: "React.js", level: 60 } ] }, { category: "Backend Development", skills: [ { name: "Node.js", level: 60 }, { name: "SQL", level: 60 } ] } ]; const softSkills = [ "Teamwork", "Communication", "Leadership" ]; return (

Skills & Expertise

A comprehensive overview of my technical skills and professional competencies.

{/* Technical Skills */}

Technical Skills

{skillCategories.map((category, index) => (

{category.category}

{category.skills.map((skill, skillIndex) => (
{skill.name} {skill.level}%
))}
))}
{/* Soft Skills */}

Professional Skills

{softSkills.map((skill, index) => (
{skill}
))}
{/* Additional Skills */}

Additional Expertise

); }; export default Skills;
